original_text: For then there will be great tribulation, such as has not been from the beginning of the world until now, no, and never will be.
korean_text: 이는 그 때에 큰 환난이 있겠음이라 창세로부터 지금까지 이런 환난이 없었고 후에도 없으리라

sentences.original_text: For then there will be great tribulation,
such as has not been from the beginning of the world until now,
